snippet.title: Glassbreakers Showcase | DevTalk: Customization
snippet.description:
Play Glassbreakers Early Access! 🔗 https://glassbreakersgame.com/

May the Glass break your way in Polyarc’s new competitive multiplayer game! 

Polyarc is the development studio behind the Game Awards' "Best AR/VR Game" Moss: Book II and its critically acclaimed predecessor Moss.

Join the Glassbreakers community!
Wishlist: https://pulse.pulse.ly/gnjnexqfg3
Twitter: https://twitter.com/glassbreakersvr
Discord: https://discord.gg/glassbreakersgame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@glassbreakersgame
More: linktr.ee/glassbreakersgame

#Glassbreakers #gamedev  #vrgames  #gamedev  #gamedevelopment  #virtualreality  #metaquest2
